title: Only the good ones
author: VD
content_html:
Vox, just curious… does WND ever forward on to you letters to the editor about your columns that they don’t publish? They have to get tons of letters to the editor daily.

My editor only sends on a very few, usually those that are exceptionally amusing or raise a point similar to one that he’d been considering himself. I did get a little irritated once when they ran one that specifically addressed me without letting me know about it, so he sends those on to me as well although not very often since they usually focus on those addressed to Mr. Farah since WND is his show.

I’ve noticed that my quantity of critical mail dropped off a cliff once I started running my mailvox column and then got the blog going. Pity, I do so enjoy responding to that sort of thing.

I did get a little irritated once when they ran one that specifically addressed me without letting me know about it, so he sends those on to me as well although not very often since they usually focus on those addressed to Mr. Farah since WND is his show.
I’ve noticed that my quantity of critical mail dropped off a cliff once I started running my mailvox column and then got the blog going.  Pity, I do so enjoy responding to that sort of thing.
